Name: Fairytale Lionfish
Description: A rare lionfish species. Its vibrant colors serve as camouflage. They hide within the coral reef in the Gem Sea. Rumors say these fish serve as an ingredient for an ancient love potion.

DescriptionLocalization.zh: 一种稀有的狮子鱼，鲜艳的外观是它的伪装。它们躲在宝石海的珊瑚礁里。有传言说这些鱼是一种古老爱情药剂的成分之一。
